p: At days 28 and 37, fresh fecal samples were collected from all experimental pens for assessment of coccidial oocyst output. The McMaster technique was used to detect and count coccidian oocysts in fecal samples ( 37, 38). Eimeria acervulina unsporulated oocysts were identified according to morphological features (oocyst shape, mean oocyst length, and mean oocyst width after microscopic examination).
